title: #028 - UNCLE JOEY'S JOINT
description:
Welcome to Uncle Joey's Joint....

Today, We talk about what it means to be a friend....

This episode is brought to you by ONNIT & DraftKings......

Go to https://www.onnit.com and enter Code: CHURCH

Go to https://www.DraftKings.com and enter Code: JOEY

And don’t forget.....

The Mind Of Joey Diaz is on PATREON:

https://www.patreon.com/joeydiaz

#JoeyDiaz #Madflavor #UncleJoeysJoint
